trans-unit.source: Defines the methods that workflow designer hosts can call to perform advanced UI operations.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The methods and properties provided by IExtendedUIService allow designer hosts to navigate to properties in the property browser window and allow the hosts to add task items to the task list.
Instructs the workflow designer host to add an assembly reference for the current project to access.
An <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> that identifies the assembly to add.
Adds an array of designer actions to the list of available user actions in the workflow designer host.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> array that contains the actions to add.
Adds a reference to a Web resource to a project in a workflow designer.
When this method returns, contains a <xref:System.Uri> that represents the universal resource locator (URL) of the Web resource to provide the project access to.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains a <xref:System.Type> of the proxy class associated with the Web resource.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> value that indicates the return value of the **Add Web Reference** dialog box.
Returns the type of the proxy class associated with the specified universal resource locator (URL).
A <xref:System.Uri> that represents a URL.
The <xref:System.Type> of the proxy class.
Provides contextual information about the current component.
Returns property context.
Returns the universal resource locator (URL) for the Web resource associated with the specified proxy class.
The <xref:System.Type> associated with the proxy class.
The URL for the Web resource associated with the proxy class.
Returns the types that are generated for the XSD schema that is added to the workflow project.
The types that are generated for the XSD schema that is added to the workflow project.
Navigates to the specified property in the property browser of the workflow designer host.
The name of the property to navigate to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property was navigated to successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Deletes all designer actions in the task list associated with the workflow designer host.
Displays the tools options associated with the workflow designer host.
